title: No results displayed when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When attempting to search using the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: No search results are displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
EB: Search results should be displayed when searching via the Package view selection and dialog.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Attempt to search for declarations using the search dialog.
3. No search results should be displayed.

Note: Searching via the context menu in the Packages view works as expected.

Expected result: The search function should first try to get the Java element. If it is unable to find the Java element, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.

Additional notes: None.
